basics.name: Neil Perry
basics.label: Researcher
basics.summary: I received my PhD at Stanford University and my BA in Computer Science, Economics, Mathematics, and Liberal Arts from the University of Wisconsin-Madison. My research interests lie in applying cryptography to societal problems. Additionally, I advise politicians and members of the US government on issues related to tech policy and national security.

work.name: The Hoover Institution, Stanford University
work.summary: Helped develop a comprehensive report for Congress and the White House, focusing on the implications of emerging technologies and their influence on policy.

work.name: Wisconsin State Assembly
work.summary: Intern for Rep. Vruwink. Drafted legislation, reviewed and improved operational security practices, worked with constituents on various issues, and attended public hearings and caucus meetings.

work.name: Netflix
work.summary: Intern on the FTL team, working with the Open Connect and Video Streaming Algorithms teams on the effects and causes of latency

work.name: University of Wisconsin-Madison
work.summary: Conduct research for the Computer Science department at UW-Madison in the field of blockchain networks. Research how storage faults impact the behavior of nodes on the Ethereum network. Publication in preparation.

work.name: Cosmic Chimp LLC
work.summary: Cofounded Cosmic Chimp LLC, a freelance website company. Responsible for designing backend architectures and payment processing. Latest project: www.mariefritzperryart.com

work.name: VN Capital Management
work.summary: Perform economic analysis of grain markets throughout the Northern U.S. and Canada; engineer solutions to public image problems of companies that the hedge fund invested in; present findings to the board of Ceres Global Ag. and meet with Senior Executives to discuss findings. Develop models to predict the prices of grain elevators. Analyze and improve website design and content for marketing purposes of companies within the portfolio.

work.name: Facebook Marketing Campaign Strategist and Consultant
work.summary: Consulted on advertising campaigns for several entrepreneurs advertising products on Facebook including educational materials, fine-art, and physical products sold on Amazon.com. Produced an 83-page guide to Facebook marketing and campaign strategies, designed and taught online marketing funnels, and handled web development and website/funnel maintenance for my own marketing.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
